joke.content: Did you hear about the blind carpenter who picked up his hammer and saw?
Did you hear about the deaf shepherd who gathered his flock and heard (herd)?
A teacher is talking to a student. Teacher: Did your father help you with your homework? Student: No, he did it all by himself.
A: "I was born in California." B: "Which part?" A: "All of me."
A man was complaining to a railroad engineer. Man: What's the use of having a train schedule if the trains are always late. Engineer: How would we know they were late, if we didn't have a schedule?
A: "Excuse me. Do you know the way to the zoo?" B: "No, I'm sorry I don't." A: "Well, it's two blocks this way, then one block to the left."
